MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL23 and LL40 postcode areas of Bala and Dolgellau, affecting properties in Llanuwchllyn and the surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 7:21 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded overhead line and traffic management needed to complete the repair. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:13 am on 12th April, 2021.
